titleStmt.title: A remonstrance or declaration of the state of the kingdome agreed on by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament the 19th of May, MDCXLII : with divers depositions and letters thereunto annexed.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.O. and G.D. for F.C.,

notesStmt.note: Earlier editions have title: A remonstrance of the state of the kingdome.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
